title: Lure
description: There's danger in the beauty...Two years, six months, and twenty-five days. That's how long it had been since I'd seen my winged heroâ€” not that I'd been counting. I'd suffered through years of counseling just to convince my friends and family that I wasn't crazy and knew he didn't exist.But he did. And I was done waiting.Days after college graduation I headed back down to New Orleans to retrace my steps and find Owen again only to find my life was about to get even crazier... thanks to the most beautiful and dangerous of all paranormal creatures, the Allures.
author: Alyssa Rose Ivy
